episodes.synopsis: Julien, a poor but ambitious young man, takes a job tutoring a wealthy family's sons, resulting in a scandalous affair with their matriarch.
episodes.title: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: After his affair is discovered, Julien goes to seminary and works for the Marquis de la Mole, where he learns the customs of aristocracy.
episodes.title: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: As he advances his social status with the help of the Marquis, Julien begins an affair with Mathilde, only to be rejected as a lowly servant.
episodes.title: Part 3

video.title: The Scarlet and the Black
video.synopsis: Ewan McGregor and Rachel Weisz star in this miniseries about a poor but ambitious young man who hopes to better his station by seducing wealthy women.
